rain_anomaly_dekad.title: 10-day rainfall anomaly
rain_anomaly_dekad.legend_text: 10-day precipitation anomaly compared to the long term average. Derived from [CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group)](https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps).

rain_anomaly_1month.title: 1-month rainfall anomaly
rain_anomaly_1month.legend_text: 1-month precipitation anomaly compared to the long term average. Derived from [CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group)](https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps).

rain_anomaly_3month.title: 3-month rainfall anomaly
rain_anomaly_3month.legend_text: 3-month precipitation anomaly compared to the long term average. Derived from [CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group)](https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps).

rain_anomaly_6month.title: 6-month rainfall anomaly
rain_anomaly_6month.legend_text: 6-month precipitation anomaly compared to the long term average. Derived from [CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group)](https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps).

rain_anomaly_9month.title: 9-month rainfall anomaly
rain_anomaly_9month.legend_text: 9-month precipitation anomaly compared to the long term average. Derived from [CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group)](https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps).

rain_anomaly_1year.title: 1-year rainfall anomaly
rain_anomaly_1year.legend_text: 1-year precipitation anomaly compared to the long term average. Derived from [CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group)](https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps).

rainfall_dekad.title: 10-day rainfall estimate (mm)
rainfall_dekad.legend_text: Estimate of precipitation over a 10-day period derived from [CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group)](https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps).

rainfall_agg_1month.title: 1-month rainfall aggregate
rainfall_agg_1month.legend_text: Estimate of precipitation over a 1-month period derived from [CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group)](https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps).

rainfall_agg_3month.title: 3-month rainfall aggregate (mm)
rainfall_agg_3month.legend_text: Estimate of precipitation over a 3-month period derived from [CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group)](https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps).

rainfall_agg_6month.title: 6-month rainfall aggregate (mm)
rainfall_agg_6month.legend_text: Estimate of precipitation over a 6-month period derived from [CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group)](https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps).

rainfall_agg_9month.title: 9-month rainfall aggregate (mm)
rainfall_agg_9month.legend_text: Estimate of precipitation over a 9-month period derived from [CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group)](https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps).

rainfall_agg_1year.title: 1-year rainfall aggregate (mm)
rainfall_agg_1year.legend_text: Estimate of precipitation over a 1-year period derived from [CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group)](https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps).

spi_1m.title: SPI - 1-month
spi_1m.legend_text: 1-month Standardized Precipitation Index calculated from dekadal CHIRPS data

spi_3m.title: SPI - 3-month
spi_3m.legend_text: 3-month Standardized Precipitation Index calculated from dekadal CHIRPS data

spi_6m.title: SPI - 6-month
spi_6m.legend_text: 6-month Standardized Precipitation Index calculated from dekadal CHIRPS data

spi_9m.title: SPI - 9-month
spi_9m.legend_text: 9-month Standardized Precipitation Index calculated from dekadal CHIRPS data

spi_1y.title: SPI - 1-year
spi_1y.legend_text: 1-year Standardized Precipitation Index calculated from dekadal CHIRPS data

precip_blended_dekad.title: Blended rainfall estimates (10-day)
precip_blended_dekad.legend_text: Local station data blended with CHIRP rainfall estimates

precip_blended_1m.title: Blended rainfall aggregate (1-month)
precip_blended_1m.legend_text: Local station data blended with CHIRP rainfall estimates

precip_blended_3m.title: Blended rainfall aggregate (3-month)
precip_blended_3m.legend_text: Local station data blended with CHIRP rainfall estimates

precip_blended_6m.title: Blended rainfall aggregate (6-month)
precip_blended_6m.legend_text: Local station data blended with CHIRP rainfall estimates

precip_blended_9m.title: Blended rainfall aggregate (9-month)
precip_blended_9m.legend_text: Local station data blended with CHIRP rainfall estimates

precip_blended_1y.title: Blended rainfall aggregate (1-year)
precip_blended_1y.legend_text: Local station data blended with CHIRP rainfall estimates

precip_blended_dekad_anomaly.title: Blended rainfall anomaly (10-day)
precip_blended_dekad_anomaly.legend_text: Rainfall anomaly based on long term averaged from local station data blended with CHIRP rainfall estimates

precip_blended_anomaly_1m.title: Blended rainfall anomaly (1-month)
precip_blended_anomaly_1m.legend_text: Rainfall anomaly based on long term averaged from local station data blended with CHIRP rainfall estimates

precip_blended_anomaly_3m.title: Blended rainfall anomaly (3-month)
precip_blended_anomaly_3m.legend_text: Rainfall anomaly based on long term averaged from local station data blended with CHIRP rainfall estimates

precip_blended_anomaly_6m.title: Blended rainfall anomaly (6-month)
precip_blended_anomaly_6m.legend_text: Rainfall anomaly based on long term averaged from local station data blended with CHIRP rainfall estimates

precip_blended_anomaly_9m.title: Blended rainfall anomaly (9-month)
precip_blended_anomaly_9m.legend_text: Rainfall anomaly based on long term averaged from local station data blended with CHIRP rainfall estimates

precip_blended_anomaly_1y.title: Blended rainfall anomaly (1-year)
precip_blended_anomaly_1y.legend_text: Rainfall anomaly based on long term averaged from local station data blended with CHIRP rainfall estimates

precip_blended_dekad_agg.title: Blended monthly aggregate rainfall
precip_blended_dekad_agg.legend_text: Monthly aggregate rainfall based on local station data blended with CHIRP estimates

days_dry.title: Days since last rain
days_dry.legend_text: Number of consecutive days with less than 2 mm precipitation in the last 30 days

streak_dry_days.title: Longest dry spell
streak_dry_days.legend_text: Longest number of consecutive days with less than 2 mm precipitation in the last 30 days

days_heavy_rain.title: Number of days with heavy rainfall in the last 30 days
days_heavy_rain.legend_text: Total number of heavy rain days (rainfall > 75th percentile) within last 30 days of dekad

days_intense_rain.title: Number of days with intense rainfall in the last 30 days
days_intense_rain.legend_text: Total number of heavy rain days (rainfall > 90th percentile) within last 30 days of dekad

days_extreme_rain.title: Number of days with extreme rainfall in the last 30 days
days_extreme_rain.legend_text: Total number of heavy rain days (rainfall > 95th percentile) within last 30 days of dekad

streak_heavy_rain.title: Longest consecutive heavy rainfall days
streak_heavy_rain.legend_text: Longest consecutive number of heavy rain days (rainfall > 75th percentile) within last 30 days of dekad

streak_intense_rain.title: Longest consecutive intense rainfall days
streak_intense_rain.legend_text: Longest consecutive number of intense rain days (rainfall > 90th percentile) within last 30 days of dekad

streak_extreme_rain.title: Longest consecutive extreme rainfall days
streak_extreme_rain.legend_text: Longest consecutive number of extreme rain days (rainfall > 95th percentile) within last 30 days of dekad

ndvi_dekad.title: 10-day NDVI 1km (MODIS)
ndvi_dekad.legend_text: Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) derived from MODIS TERRA/AQUA

lst_amplitude.title: Land Surface Temperature - 10-day Amplitude (MODIS)
lst_amplitude.legend_text: Land Surface Temperature Amplitude refers to the difference between the maximum and minimum temperature in degrees Celsius

lst_daytime_blended.title: Mean maximum air temperature (10-day)
lst_daytime_blended.legend_text: Local station data blended with MODIS daytime land surface temperature estimates

lst_day_anomaly_blended.title: Mean maximum air temperature anomaly (10-day)
lst_day_anomaly_blended.legend_text: Temperature anomaly based on long term average compared to local station data blended with MODIS daytime land surface temperature estimates

poor_hhs.title: Proportion of poor households
poor_hhs.legend_text: Proportion of poor households. Source: https://digitalnamibia.nsa.org.na/
